body.raw:
{
  "name": "Personal Information",
  "description": "Gather Personal Information",
  "isMultiResponse": false,
  "homeworkQuestions": [
        {
      "questionAbbr": "Name",
      "question": "What is your Name?",
      "questionType": "STRING",
      "isRequired": true,
      "responseOptions": [],
      "triggerProtocolCreation": false,
      "triggeringResponse": null,
      "triggeredProtocolId": null
    },
    {
      "questionAbbr": "Age",
      "question": "What is your Age?",
      "questionType": "INTEGER",
      "isRequired": true,
      "responseOptions": [],
      "triggerProtocolCreation": false,
      "triggeringResponse": null,
      "triggeredProtocolId": null
    },
    {
      "questionAbbr": "Bank Account Balance",
      "question": "What is your Primary Bank Account Balance?",
      "questionType": "FLOAT",
      "isRequired": false,
      "responseOptions": [],
      "triggerProtocolCreation": false,
      "triggeringResponse": null,
      "triggeredProtocolId": null
    },
    {
      "questionAbbr": "DOBy",
      "question": "What is your Date of Birth?",
      "questionType": "DATE",
      "isRequired": true,
      "responseOptions": [],
      "triggerProtocolCreation": false,
      "triggeringResponse": null,
      "triggeredProtocolId": null
    },
    {
      "questionAbbr": "Bank Account Open Timestamp",
      "question": "What date and time did you open your primary bank account?",
      "questionType": "DATETIME",
      "isRequired": false,
      "responseOptions": [],
      "triggerProtocolCreation": false,
      "triggeringResponse": null,
      "triggeredProtocolId": null
    },
    {
      "questionAbbr": "US Resident",
      "question": "Are you a US Resident?",
      "questionType": "BOOLEAN",
      "isRequired": true,
      "responseOptions": [],
      "triggerProtocolCreation": false,
      "triggeringResponse": null,
      "triggeredProtocolId": null
    },
    {
      "questionAbbr": "Driver's License",
      "question": "Please Upload your Driver's License.",
      "questionType": "FILE",
      "isRequired": true,
      "responseOptions": [],
      "triggerProtocolCreation": false,
      "triggeringResponse": null,
      "triggeredProtocolId": null
    },
    {
      "questionAbbr": "Do you like Pizza?",
      "question": "Do you like Pizza?",
      "questionType": "SELECT_OPTION",
      "isRequired": true,
      "responseOptions": [
        {
          "response": "Yes",
          "tooltip": "Yes you like pizza"
        },
        {
          "response": "No",
          "tooltip": "No you don't like pizza"
        }
      ],
      "triggerProtocolCreation": true,
      "triggeringResponse": {
        "response": "Yes",
        "tooltip": "Yes you like pizza"
      },
      "triggeredProtocolId": 7
    },
    {
      "questionAbbr": "Tax Filing Status",
      "question": "Describe your Financial Investment Profile?",
      "questionType": "MULTI_SELECT_OPTION",
      "isRequired": true,
      "responseOptions": [
        {
            "tooltip": "Maverick",
            "response": "Maverick"
        },
        {
            "tooltip": "Conservative",
            "response": "Conservative"
        },
        {
            "tooltip": "Aggressive",
            "response": "Aggressive"
        },
        {
            "tooltip": "Frog-on-a-Log",
            "response": "Frog-on-a-Log"
        }
      ],
      "triggerProtocolCreation": false,
      "triggeringResponse": null,
      "triggeredProtocolId": null
    }
  ]
}
